content: CRISPR gene-editing therapy for hereditary anemia in preclinical stage. Target gene: HBB variant.
metadata: Project code: CR-GE, sponsor: GeneTech Labs, next milestone: animal safety data Q3 2025

content: Cell-based immunotherapy for aggressive lymphoma. CAR-T design with dual antigen targeting.
metadata: Project code: LYM-CAR2, collaboration: OncoCell Inc., Phase I enrollment in 2025

content: Regenerative scaffolding for spinal cord injury. Biomaterial pilot showing improved nerve regrowth in rodents.
metadata: Project code: Regen-Spine, sponsor: BioRenew Ltd., next step: IND prep

content: mRNA vaccine platform adaptions for multiple viral strains. Focus on rapid design within 30 days of new variant detection.
metadata: Lab code: mVac-Gen2, potential government contract, mid-2025 trial target

content: Microbiome engineering for gut disorders. Engineered Lactobacillus strain tested for IBS symptom relief.
metadata: Pilot code: MicroGut, sponsor: Digestive Solutions, early volunteer data by Q4 2025
